column1: OK for sure COVID is raging out of control and Trump is plotting a coup against democracy itself. Q: How to stay sane while we fight for justice? A: Go out in the first snow of the season with Augie who loves the white stuff however minimal and fleeting it may be. https://t.co/FYliOkwTwI

My crystal ball is spinning. 🔮   Trump’s epic failure to handle COVID and his belligerence will lead to a blue wave not only in MI but in one or several states like OH NC GA FL TX and AZ. His losses will correlate to COVID to some extent.   Dems take the Senate 52+ seats.

Thank you @JoeBiden for pointing out that we passed a COVID relief plan in the House of Representatives in May and have been ready and willing to negotiate. We’re not the ones who waited until the election was looming...  #Debate2020

It’s so hard to comprehend the scope of economic destruction COVID + Trump’s mishandling of it have wrought.   “The economy has nearly 11M fewer jobs than it did before the pandemic a bigger loss than the 8.7M at the depth of” the Great Recession.  https://t.co/cXvuG5rntY
-Since January 2017 Michigan has lost over 57000 manufacturing jobs. -Even before COVID-19 Michigan plants were closing and a manufacturing recession had begun.

If RBG could keep fighting for justice through five bouts with cancer we can’t very well let COVID Trump Barr aches pains or anything else bring us down. Just get up each day and build the beloved community.
Welcome to #MI09 Madame Vice President! I love these creative small business visits for COVID campaigning especially when it’s in Royal Oak! #SmallBusinessWeek https://t.co/FBbmShHck3

We have just reached the grim milestone of 200000 precious lives lost to this pandemic. This week also marks the beginning of early voting in MI. While Trump is not responsible for COVID-19 he is responsible for the worst failure of executive leadership in modern history.

COVID-19 and our broken immigration system have created an interwoven human rights crisis with eerie undertones of eugenics. We need answers about these allegations now @DHSgov. https://t.co/43kyDnVqed

What a slap in the face to the nearly 7000 Michigan families who have lost a loved one to COVID-19 for Trump to break the law gather a large group with no social distancing and scream at our Governor to "Open up your state." https://t.co/9WU6OVfcGQ

Biden helped save the auto industry and tens of thousands of manufacturing jobs during the Great Recession. As we face both health and economic crises from the fallout of COVID-19 Biden’s Build Back Better plan will create  thousands of family-supporting union jobs.

This is a #LaborDay unlike any other. I dearly wish I could be out celebrating in person with all of you at our traditional parades. But COVID or no COVID Labor Day is a time to appreciate the sacrifices of those who built the labor movement with their blood sweat and tears.

“Andy is an incredible partner in the fight for big structural change. Providing national leadership on labor law reform education equity green infrastructure and our Coronavirus Containment Corps Andy has been an indispensable champion for the people.“ Thank you @ewarren! https://t.co/Ir5KkxReHP
.@SenateGOP is calling their long-overdue COVID-19 package the #HEALSAct and I predict this will the their Achilles heel on Nov 3.  https://t.co/9BvajeHzez
Imagine how we’d benefit by treating smaller nations with humility and respect raising up workers everywhere and helping poorer nations tackle COVID-19 and climate change.

Happy birthday to my dear friend @ewarren. What a year it has been traveling around the country talking about big structural change and now leading the Coronavirus Containment Corps together. I look forward to many more years fighting this fight alongside you. https://t.co/j3hbkluPJf

The U.S. has been hit harder by COVID-19 because of conscious decisions by @realDonaldTrump to not do more to fight it.  120000 Americans are dead. Don't let anyone tell you this was inevitable.   He made it this way & he's proud of it. https://t.co/23VRYnArQt

Pence better not stand in front of Macomb workers and claim that this admin did not roll over for the Chinese government on trade and COVID-19 for a corrupt deal to solicit foreign interference on behalf of this campaign. Macomb knows better and we’ll prove that in November.

Pence can stand in front of workers in Macomb today and ask them to remember the pre-COVID economy but the numbers don’t lie. Yesterday we learned our state has experienced unemployment over 20% for the second straight month.

We’re experiencing the worst unemployment since the Great Depression all because Trump failed to prepare for this COVID-19 crisis and created a fragile economy that was especially vulnerable to a downturn.   https://t.co/Knf5yar2lH

An Ed & Labor virtual hearing on Protecting Workers from COVID-19 and a virtual ceremony for my son Saul graduating with an MA in Urban Planning — I’m glad I still remember how to tie a tie in real life! https://t.co/gzFJiAa5Gg

Michigan and @GovWhitmer have been tough smart and saved lives. How proud am I when I see Michigan’s curve coming down more steeply than most others? We have to keep it up! The day after #MothersDay let me say that toughness and compassion go hand in hand. #Covid19 https://t.co/hoLpMVYXJS

This tragedy that happened many weeks ago but is only now seeing the light of day. Don’t go blaming COVID for this. Ahmaud Arbery let us all get to know you to demand justice in your name for your family. Let us commit to stopping the everyday carnage. (3/3) #AhmaudArbery

We're surrounded by structural racism from COVID-19 death rates among Black & Latino Americans to rural and urban kids unable to access online education to minority-owned businesses unable to access Payroll Protection Program while the Lakers & Ruth Chris score millions.(2/3)
My favorite story of the day: thanks to our great Macomb County Clerk @MillerforM for helping love flower in dark and difficult times. #COVID19 #TogetherAtHome https://t.co/qPprKSV7Lx

We continue to see a rise in unemployment gaps in meeting basic services (like food and clean water) and an increase in racial inequity around COVID. It’s clear we need structural change now because “inequality is America’s pre-existing condition.” https://t.co/jASFloEpsS

Every day I get up and try to do the best I can to help our country get through the biggest public health crisis of modern times.  I try to ignore all the dysfunction. But this stopped me in my tracks. A labradoodle breeder in charge of COVID-19 at HHS?! https://t.co/JeEdrF8KeH

The right to protest is what makes America America but we must not endanger others. Essential workers are risking their safety for us. We can protect the health of our citizens AND restore our economy but we must work together and #StayHome. #COVID19  https://t.co/JoPzJy9SC2

Like all universities I’m sure Stanford’s financial situation has been undermined by the COVID-19 pandemic. However in a crisis communities must look after their most precarious members first. https://t.co/lJwo2LvkT4

A virus spreading across the globe struggling to cope with all of our technology and sophistication. Clearly we are receiving a fundamental faith lesson about humility this season. (4/6) #COVID19 #Passover2020

Democrats are still organizing from home. Thank you to the Oakland County Democratic Party for allowing me to answer many questions about the resources available and the politics around the response to COVID-19. #StayHomeSaveLives https://t.co/ewDYgtEY8t
If you need a tech tutor or are a tech-savvy teen who wants to help email covid19techhelp@gmail.com

I'm so proud of the young people of MI-9 organizing during #COVID19.  Abby Margolis of Bloomfield Twp. worried technology would keep neighbors away from utilizing vital online services.  She and classmates wrote a tech manual! https://t.co/Njf9c6jfHY https://t.co/GmclBGkYe2

All of America needs your birthday wish to come true @atgarland. With #singlepayer no one would hesitate to get tested or treated for COVID-19. And we would be set up to provide hospitals with everything they need to save lives. https://t.co/YRC936PfOX
At this time of crisis I stand with my @UAW sisters and brothers who want to slow the #COVID19 pandemic by shutting down auto production temporarily. Safety before profits! https://t.co/sPonhKOYPi

When they ask what a president should do about #coronavirus I can tell you one thing: he should invoke the Defense Production Act to organize and require companies to produce the tests respirators and other equipment we need — right now! #DemDebate

The #coronavirus situation is developing and changing rapidly. We can all do our part to prevent the spread of the virus by being prepared and staying informed. I wanted to let you know what precautions my team and I are taking now to do our part.
